Package com.sun.tlddoc

Class WARJARTLDFileTagLibrary

java.lang.Object
com.sun.tlddoc.TagLibrary
com.sun.tlddoc.WARJARTLDFileTagLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class WARJARTLDFileTagLibrary extends TagLibrary
Tag library that gets its information from a TLD file in a JAR that's packaged inside a WAR.
Author:
mroth

    • getTLDDocument

      public Document getTLDDocument(DocumentBuilder documentBuilder) throws IOException, SAXException, TransformerException
      Returns a Document of the effective tag library descriptor for this tag library. This might come from a file or be implicitly generated.
      Specified by:
